ValidationRule.description: Cannot go to suitability in progress status until the relevant fields are complete
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( ISPICKVAL( Advice_Status__c, " Suitability in progress ")
,
OR( NOT( ISPICKVAL( Full_Fact_Find_Status__c, "Complete"))
,
LOA_s_Completed__c = FALSE
))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Check Fact find complete or LoAs complete fields
